summary: A modest abode, perfect for the enchanter and crafter - tanning rack, smelter, forge, sharpening wheel, cooking pot, alchemy lab and enchanter - also includes a 4k gold merchant and a UFO compatible follower. Now contains weapon racks, a display case and a mannequin!
descriptionHtml:
1.Introduction

This is my first mod for Skyrim and it basically the result of my going through some tutorials. What I\'ve created is the Crafter\'s Cavern - an underground hideout near Pelagia Farm complete with all the crafting equipment, a merchant and a follower!

2.Installation

Standard installation method. Drag and drop \'Crafter\'s Cavern.esp\' into the Skyrim/Data folder. For Steam users this can be found in /steam/steamapps/common/skyrim...

From the Skyrim launcher, select Data Files then tick Crafter\'s Cavern.

3.Features

ALL CRAFTING AND ENCHANTING GEAR (Tanning rack, workbench, alchemy lab etc...)
A MERCHANT WHO SELLS MOST BLACKSMITHING EQUIPMENT (Leather, ore etc...) AND HAS 4,000GOLD AND WILL BUY ANYTHING (except misc items)
A FOLLOWER, EQUIPPED WITH IMPERIAL ARMOUR, AND COMPATIBLE WITH \"ULTIMATE FOLLOWER OVERHAUL\"
A FAST TRAVEL MARKER TO EASILY REACH THE CRAFTER\'S CAVERN (located just South of Pelagia Farm, South of Whiterun)
THE ABILITY TO FAST TRAVEL FROM WITHIN THE CAVERN
WEAPON RACK, DISPLAY CASE AND MANNEQUIN ALL WORKING

4. Feedback and Thanks

Many thanks must go to Youtube User \'ForAdventure\' for his excellent tutorial series, this wouldn\'t exist without it.
Any feedback, comments and requests appreciated on the comments/discussion part of the Nexus page.

5. Version History

1.00 - Original
1.01 - changed the name associated with trapdoor from \"Nightgale Inn Cellar\" to \"Crafter\'s     Cavern\"
1.10 - added a working weapon rack, display case and mannequin. also added a cooking pot and smelter
1.11 - added soul gems (filled and unfilled in various sizes) to the merchants inventory at a friends request

KNOWN BUGS

The trapdoor says \"Nightgale Inn Cellar\" any advice on how to change this much appreciated. This has now been FIXED, thanks to Ghaunadaur on the forums for a fix.
author: Dangerklm
